title._content: Reserve boxes, open-air circus, Luna Park, Coney Island, N.Y. City  (LOC)

description._content: American Stereoscopic Company,, publisher. Reserve boxes, open-air circus, Luna Park, Coney Island, N.Y. City New York : American Stereoscopic Company, manufacturers and publishers, c1904 Aug. 31. 1 photographic print on stereo card : stereograph. Notes: Title from item. No. 1. Copyright 1904 by The American Stereoscopic Co. Photograph shows people seated in open-air, opera-style boxes at the outdoor circus in Luna Park, Coney Island, New York City, New York. Subjects: Amusement parks--New York (State)--New York--1900-1910. Circuses & shows--New York (State)--New York--1900-1910. Spectators--New York (State)--New York--1900-1910. Coney Island (New York, N.Y.)--1900-1910. Format: Stereographs--1900-1910. Photographic prints--1900-1910. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print More information about the Stereograph Cards is available at www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/stereo/ Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3c33261 Call Number: STEREO U.S. GEOG FILE - New York--New York City--Coney Island--Luna Park [item]
